publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1400.1 Tommy Sheridan: Domestic Abuseâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1400) in the name of Jackie Baillie, insert at end "but believes that this represents only a small step in the direction of tackling real problems which women and children who live with, are planning to leave or have left violent men face and that immediate resources need to be made directly available to women and children in this position."
